Posts.Content: So sorry for your bad news. I was on Ibrance for 3 months but it didn’t control the beast for me but I have read so many positive results for others. It’s hard to pull yourself out of the hole until you get some good news so am praying for good results for you tooğŸ™ğŸ»ğŸŒ·â¤ï¸
